verses.verse: Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the Reubenites <S%H7206><s%>, and the Gadites <S%H1425><s%>, and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>,

and said <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H8104><s%>, Ye have kept all that Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H8085><s%>, and have hearkened unto my voice <S%H6963><s%> in all that I commanded you <S%H6680><s%>:

ye have not left <S%H5800><s%> your brethren <S%H251><s%> these many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, but have kept <S%H8104><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the commandment <S%H4687><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>.

And now Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hath given rest <S%H5117><s%> unto your brethren <S%H251><s%>, as he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto them <S%H6437><s%>: therefore now turn ye <S%H3212><s%>, and get you unto your tents <S%H168><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> you beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>.

Only take diligent <S%H3966><s%> heed <S%H8104><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> the commandment <S%H4687><s%> and the law <S%H8451><s%> which Moses <S%H4872><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> you <S%H157><s%>, to love Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%>, and to walk <S%H3212><s%> in all his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to keep <S%H8104><s%> his commandments <S%H4687><s%>, and to cleave <S%H1692><s%> unto him <S%H5647><s%>, and to serve him with all your heart <S%H3824><s%> and with all your soul <S%H5315><s%>.
So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> them <S%H7971><s%>, and sent them away; and they went <S%H3212><s%> unto their tents <S%H168><s%>.

Now to the one <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> inheritance in Bashan <S%H1316><s%>; but unto the other half <S%H2677><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> among <S%H5973><s%> their brethren <S%H251><s%> beyond <S%H5676><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>; moreover when Joshua <S%H3091><s%> sent them away <S%H7971><s%> unto their tents <S%H168><s%>, he blessed them <S%H1288><s%>,

and spake <S%H559><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Return <S%H7725><s%> with much <S%H7227><s%> wealth <S%H5233><s%> unto your tents <S%H168><s%>, and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7227><s%> cattle <S%H4735><s%>, with silver <S%H3701><s%>, and with gold <S%H2091><s%>, and with brass <S%H5178><s%>, and with iron <S%H1270><s%>, and with very <S%H3966><s%> much <S%H7235><s%> raiment <S%H8008><s%>: divide <S%H2505><s%> the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of your enemies <S%H341><s%> with your brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%>, and departed <S%H3212><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, which is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, to go <S%H3212><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, to the land <S%H776><s%> of their possession <S%H272><s%>, whereof they were possessed <S%H270><s%>, according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And when they came <S%H935><s%> unto the region about the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, that is in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> there an altar <S%H4196><s%> by the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, a great <S%H1419><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> to <S%H4758><s%> look upon <S%H4758><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> say <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H1121><s%>, the children of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> have built <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> in the forefront <S%H4136><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, in the region <S%H1552><s%> about the Jordan <S%H3383><s%>, on the side that pertaineth <S%H5676><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it <S%H5712><s%>, the whole congregation of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> gathered themselves together <S%H6950><s%> at Shiloh <S%H7887><s%>, to go up <S%H5927><s%> against them to war <S%H6635><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, into the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>,

and with him ten <S%H6235><s%> princes <S%H5387><s%>, one prince <S%H5387><s%> of a fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> for each <S%H259><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and they were every one <S%H376><s%> of them head <S%H7218><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses <S%H1004><s%> among the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

And they came <S%H935><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, and they spake <S%H1696><s%> with them <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Thus saith <S%H559><s%> the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, What trespass <S%H4604><s%> is this that ye have committed <S%H4603><s%> against the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to turn away <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in that ye have builded <S%H1129><s%> you an altar <S%H4196><s%>, to rebel <S%H4775><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>?

Is the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of Peor <S%H6465><s%> too little <S%H4592><s%> for us <S%H2891><s%>, from which we have not cleansed ourselves unto this day <S%H3117><s%>, although there came a plague <S%H5063><s%> upon the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>,

that ye must turn away <S%H7725><s%> this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>? and it will be <S%H4775><s%>, seeing ye rebel to-day <S%H3117><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, that to-morrow <S%H4279><s%> he will be wroth <S%H7107><s%> with the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Howbeit <S%H389><s%>, if the land <S%H776><s%> of your possession <S%H272><s%> be unclean <S%H2931><s%>, then pass ye over <S%H5674><s%> unto the land <S%H776><s%> of the possession <S%H272><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, wherein Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>'s tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> dwelleth <S%H7931><s%>, and take possession <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> us <S%H4775><s%>: but rebel not against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, nor <S%H408><s%> rebel <S%H4775><s%> against us <S%H1129><s%>, in building you an altar <S%H4196><s%> besides <S%H1107><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>.

Did not Achan <S%H5912><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%> commit <S%H4603><s%> a trespass <S%H4604><s%> in the devoted thing <S%H2764><s%>, and wrath <S%H7110><s%> fell <S%H1961><s%> upon all the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>? and that man <S%H376><s%> perished <S%H1478><s%> not alone <S%H259><s%> in his iniquity <S%H5771><s%>.

Then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the <S%H2677><s%> half-tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> unto the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>,

The Mighty One <S%H410><s%>, God, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, <S%H430><s%> the Mighty One <S%H410><s%>, God, Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, <S%H430><s%> he knoweth <S%H3045><s%>; and Israel <S%H3478><s%> he shall know <S%H3045><s%>: if it be in rebellion <S%H4777><s%>, or if in trespass <S%H4604><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> (save <S%H3467><s%> thou us not this day <S%H3117><s%>,)

that we have built <S%H1129><s%> us an altar <S%H4196><s%> to turn <S%H7725><s%> away from following <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; or if to offer <S%H5927><s%> thereon burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> or meal-offering <S%H5930><s%>, or if to offer <S%H6213><s%> sacrifices of <S%H8002><s%> peace-offerings <S%H2077><s%> thereon <S%H3068><s%>, let Jehovah himself require it <S%H1245><s%>;

and if we have not rather out of carefulness <S%H1674><s%> done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H1697><s%>, and of purpose <S%H559><s%>, saying, In time to come <S%H4279><s%> your children <S%H1121><s%> might speak <S%H559><s%> unto our children <S%H1121><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>, What have ye to do with Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?

for Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> hath made <S%H5414><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> a border <S%H1366><s%> between us and you <S%H1121><s%>, ye children of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>; ye have no portion <S%H2506><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: so might your children <S%H1121><s%> make <S%H7673><s%> our children <S%H1121><s%> cease <S%H7673><s%> from <S%H1115><s%> fearing <S%H3372><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.
Therefore we said <S%H559><s%>, Let us now prepare <S%H6213><s%> to build <S%H1129><s%> us an altar <S%H4196><s%>, not for burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, nor for sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>:

but it shall be a witness <S%H5707><s%> between us and you <S%H1755><s%>, and between our generations after <S%H310><s%> us <S%H5647><s%>, that we may do the service <S%H5656><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him with our burnt-offerings <S%H5930><s%>, and with our sacrifices <S%H2077><s%>, and with our peace-offerings <S%H5930><s%>; that your children <S%H1121><s%> may not say <S%H559><s%> to our children <S%H1121><s%> in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, Ye have no portion <S%H2506><s%> in Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

Therefore said <S%H559><s%> we <S%H559><s%>, It shall be, when they so say to us or to our generations <S%H1755><s%> in time to come <S%H4279><s%>, that we shall say <S%H559><s%>, Behold <S%H7200><s%> the pattern <S%H8403><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, which our fathers <S%H1><s%> made <S%H6213><s%>, not for burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, nor for sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>; but it is a witness between us and you <S%H5707><s%>.

Far be <S%H2486><s%> it from us that we should rebel <S%H4775><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, and turn <S%H7725><s%> away this day <S%H3117><s%> from following <S%H310><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, to build <S%H1129><s%> an altar <S%H4196><s%> for burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, for meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>, or for sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, besides the altar <S%H4196><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> that is before <S%H6440><s%> his tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And when Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%>, even the heads <S%H7218><s%> of the thousands <S%H505><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> that were with him <S%H8085><s%>, heard the words <S%H1697><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%>, it pleased them well <S%H3190><s%>.

And Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, This day <S%H3117><s%> we know <S%H3045><s%> that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of us <S%H4603><s%>, because ye have not committed this trespass <S%H4604><s%> against Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>: now <S%H227><s%> have ye delivered <S%H5337><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

And Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>, and the princes <S%H5387><s%>, returned <S%H7725><s%> from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, and from the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%>, unto the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, and brought <S%H7725><s%> them word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%>.

And the thing <S%H1697><s%> pleased <S%H3190><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> blessed <S%H1288><s%> God <S%H430><s%>, and spake no more <S%H559><s%> of going up <S%H5927><s%> against them to war <S%H6635><s%>, to destroy <S%H7843><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> wherein the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children of Gad <S%H1410><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> Ed <S%H5707><s%>: For, said they, it is a witness between us that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is God <S%H430><s%>.
